FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key linking to the question table.

FIELD.NAME: responseformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of response format file (files).

FIELD.NAME: attachments
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether, and how many, attachments a student is allowed to include with their response. -1 means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: attachmentsrequired
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of attachments that should be required

FIELD.NAME: filetypeslist
FIELD.COMMENT: What attachment file type a student is allowed to include with their response. * or empty means unlimited.
